result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Derricka L Love

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Derricka L Love appeared by video.  Attorney Craig Robert Johnson appeared by video for Derricka L Love.  Attorney Patrick T. Franken in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Status Conference. Discussion with parties put forth on the record. Court orders case track along as a Status Conference date to co-side with co-defendant case. Case adjourned to Branch 16.
Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Derricka L Love appeared by video.  Attorney Craig Robert Johnson appeared by video for Derricka L Love.  Attorney Abby Rockendorf appeared in court on behalf of Patrick T. Franken for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Status Conference. Parties are still in negotiations and are requesting an adjourned status conference date. Case adjourned to Br 16.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Derricka L Love in court.  Attorney Craig Robert Johnson in court for Derricka L Love.  Attorney Patrick T. Franken in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Defense counsel informs court that they have received discovery materials, but are still awaiting an offer from the State. Court calendars the next court date for a status conference date and sets 10/10/2022 deadline to file any motions. Case adjourned to Br 16.
Status conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Derricka L Love in court with attorney Craig Robert Johnson.  Arthur Kenneth Thexton appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  Derricka L Love appeared by video means with Attorney.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 16, Judge Grayson. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire & Waiver

Defendant Derricka L Love in court by video.  Edward OBrien appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. Attorney Craig Johnson to be appointed. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff's Department 5/26/2022

Cash bail bond previously posted to be returned to remitter. 
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Derricka L Love in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Derricka L Love
Current: 5771 N 69TH, Milwaukee, WI 53201   (Effective: 06-30-2022)
Prior: 9071L North 95th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53224
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 6/30/2 @ 1p
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 06/30/2022@1pm
